Detailed Description

Fly3D scene data file management class.

This class implements a manager and interface for Fly3D's scene data files (.fly files). Its members are a pointer to a data buffer containing the file load on memory, the current access position in the file and the total length of the file. Among the methods available in this class are: opening and closing a file, seeking a position in it, unzipping a zipped file, reading a certain amount of data from the file, and more.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
